summary: SVG path converter tool to convert SVG paths into CSS clip-path outputs with selectable conversion modes and previews.

existing_features.title: Add an SVG *input preview* that renders the user-provided SVG path (`d` attribute) so users can visually verify the input shape.
Update the existing preview UI to support previewing *both* the input shape and the output clip-path result (e.g., via top-level tabs/segmented control: “Input Preview” and “Output Preview”).
Plumb the raw SVG path string from `ConverterSection` into the preview component so the preview can render the input SVG path (update `PreviewSection` props accordingly).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add conversion options: SVG path → clip-path: path() and SVG path → clip-path: polygon()/shape selectable via UI control.
Add preview for both input (SVG path) and output (generated clip-path) so users can visually compare results.

projectName: Add visual preview for both SVG input and converted clip-path output
